skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Remac Home APP is a smart home management software launched by Remac Technology Co., Ltd. Through the Remac Home APP, interaction between mobile phones and smart devices can be achieved, and interconnection between smart devices can also be realized.
